Boots.description:
UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +25 Movement Speed. Increases to +105 Movement Speed when out of combat for 5 seconds.

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Boots.name: Boots of Mobility
Boots.plaintext: Greatly enhances Movement Speed when out of combat
Boots.sanitizedDescription: UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +25 Movement Speed. Increases to +105 Movement Speed when out of combat for 5 seconds. (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Boots.description:
+25% Attack Speed

UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Boots.name: Berserker's Greaves
Boots.plaintext: Enhances Movement Speed and Attack Speed
Boots.sanitizedDescription: +25% Attack Speed UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Boots.description:
+15 Magic Penetration

UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed

(Magic Penetration: Magic damage is increased by ignoring an amount of the target's Magic Resist equal to Magic Penetration.)

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Boots.name: Sorcerer's Shoes
Boots.plaintext: Enhances Movement Speed and magic damage
Boots.sanitizedDescription: +15 Magic Penetration UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed (Magic Penetration: Magic damage is increased by ignoring an amount of the target's Magic Resist equal to Magic Penetration.) (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Elixirs.description:
Level 9 required to purchase.

Click to Consume: Grants +250 Health, 15% Bonus Damage to Towers and Siege Commander for 3 minutes.

Siege Commander: Nearby minions gain 15% Bonus Damage to Towers and gain Movement Speed based on champion's Movement Speed.

(Only one Flask effect may be active at a time.)
Elixirs.name: Elixir of Ruin
Elixirs.plaintext: Temporarily grants Health and boosts the speed and power of nearby minions versus Towers.
Elixirs.sanitizedDescription: Level 9 required to purchase. Click to Consume: Grants +250 Health, 15% Bonus Damage to Towers and Siege Commander for 3 minutes. Siege Commander: Nearby minions gain 15% Bonus Damage to Towers and gain Movement Speed based on champion's Movement Speed. (Only one Flask effect may be active at a time.)

Elixirs.description:
Level 9 required to purchase.

Click to Consume: Grants 25% increased Size, Slow Resistance, Tenacity and Path of Iron for 3 minutes.

Path of Iron: Moving leaves a path behind that boosts allied champion's Movement Speed by 15%.

(Only one Flask effect may be active at a time.)
Elixirs.name: Elixir of Iron
Elixirs.plaintext: Temporarily reduces the power of enemy crowd control effects. Leaves a trail for allies to follow.
Elixirs.sanitizedDescription: Level 9 required to purchase. Click to Consume: Grants 25% increased Size, Slow Resistance, Tenacity and Path of Iron for 3 minutes. Path of Iron: Moving leaves a path behind that boosts allied champion's Movement Speed by 15%. (Only one Flask effect may be active at a time.)

Endgame Items.description:
+75 Attack Damage
+100% Base Health Regen
+12% Life Steal

Passive: Life Steal applies to damage dealt by this item.
UNIQUE Passive - Cleave: Basic attacks deal 20% to 60% of total Attack Damage as bonus physical damage to enemies near the target on hit (enemies closest to the target take the most damage).
UNIQUE Active - Crescent: Deals 60% to 100% of total Attack Damage as physical damage to nearby enemy units (closest enemies take the most damage) (10 second cooldown).

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Endgame Items.name: Ravenous Hydra (Melee Only)
Endgame Items.plaintext: Melee attacks hit nearby enemies, dealing damage and restoring Health
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +75 Attack Damage +100% Base Health Regen +12% Life Steal Passive: Life Steal applies to damage dealt by this item. UNIQUE Passive - Cleave: Basic attacks deal 20% to 60% of total Attack Damage as bonus physical damage to enemies near the target on hit (enemies closest to the target take the most damage). UNIQUE Active - Crescent: Deals 60% to 100% of total Attack Damage as physical damage to nearby enemy units (closest enemies take the most damage) (10 second cooldown). (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Endgame Items.description:
+40% Attack Speed
+20% Critical Strike Chance
+6% Movement Speed

UNIQUE Passive: Grants Static Charges upon moving or attacking. At 100 Charges, basic attacking expends all Charges to deal 100 bonus magic damage to up to 4 targets on hit (this damage can critically strike).
Endgame Items.name: Statikk Shiv
Endgame Items.plaintext: Movement builds charges that release chain lightning on basic attack
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +40% Attack Speed +20% Critical Strike Chance +6% Movement Speed UNIQUE Passive: Grants Static Charges upon moving or attacking. At 100 Charges, basic attacking expends all Charges to deal 100 bonus magic damage to up to 4 targets on hit (this damage can critically strike).

Endgame Items.description:
+80 Attack Damage
+20% Critical Strike Chance

UNIQUE Passive: Critical strikes deal 250% damage instead of 200%.
Endgame Items.name: Infinity Edge
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +80 Attack Damage +20% Critical Strike Chance UNIQUE Passive: Critical strikes deal 250% damage instead of 200%.

Endgame Items.description:
+100 Ability Power
+10% Movement Speed

UNIQUE Passive: Gain charges upon moving or casting. At 100 charges, the next spell hit expends all charges to deal 100 (+10% AP) bonus magic damage to up to 4 targets on hit.
Endgame Items.name: Luden's Echo
Endgame Items.plaintext: Increases Ability Power and Movement Speed
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +100 Ability Power +10% Movement Speed UNIQUE Passive: Gain charges upon moving or casting. At 100 charges, the next spell hit expends all charges to deal 100 (+10% AP) bonus magic damage to up to 4 targets on hit.

Endgame Items.description:
+120 Ability Power

UNIQUE Passive: Increases Ability Power by 35%.
Endgame Items.name: Rabadon's Deathcap
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +120 Ability Power UNIQUE Passive: Increases Ability Power by 35%.

Endgame Items.description:
+30 Attack Damage
+30 Ability Power
+30% Attack Speed
+10% Critical Strike Chance
+8% Movement Speed
+250 Health
+200 Mana

UNIQUE Passive - Rage: Basic attacks grant 20 Movement Speed for 2 seconds. Kills grant 60 Movement Speed instead. This Movement Speed bonus is halved for ranged champions.
UNIQUE Passive - Spellblade: After using an ability, the next basic attack deals bonus physical damage equal to 200% of base Attack Damage on hit (1.5 second cooldown).

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Endgame Items.name: Trinity Force
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +30 Attack Damage +30 Ability Power +30% Attack Speed +10% Critical Strike Chance +8% Movement Speed +250 Health +200 Mana UNIQUE Passive - Rage: Basic attacks grant 20 Movement Speed for 2 seconds. Kills grant 60 Movement Speed instead. This Movement Speed bonus is halved for ranged champions. UNIQUE Passive - Spellblade: After using an ability, the next basic attack deals bonus physical damage equal to 200% of base Attack Damage on hit (1.5 second cooldown). (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Endgame Items.description:
+80 Ability Power
+20% Cooldown Reduction
+100% Base Mana Regen

UNIQUE Passive: Dealing magic damage to enemy champions below 40% Health inflicts Grievous Wounds for 4 seconds.

(Grievous Wounds reduces incoming healing and regeneration effects by 50%.)
Endgame Items.name: Morellonomicon
Endgame Items.plaintext: Greatly increases Ability Power and Cooldown Reduction
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +80 Ability Power +20% Cooldown Reduction +100% Base Mana Regen UNIQUE Passive: Dealing magic damage to enemy champions below 40% Health inflicts Grievous Wounds for 4 seconds. (Grievous Wounds reduces incoming healing and regeneration effects by 50%.)

Jungle Items.description:
+30 Bonus Gold per Large Monster Kill
Passive - Blasting Smite: Smite deals damage in an area, dealing half damage to all monsters and enemy minions near the target and stuns them for 1.5 seconds. Casting Smite on a monster restores 15% of missing Health and Mana.

Passive - Jungler: Deal 45 additional magic damage to monsters over 2 seconds and gain 10 Health Regen and 5 Mana Regen per second while under attack from neutral monsters.

Limited to 1 Jungle item
Jungle Items.name: Ranger's Trailblazer
Jungle Items.plaintext: Makes your Smite hit all monsters in an area, stunning them.
Jungle Items.sanitizedDescription: +30 Bonus Gold per Large Monster Kill Passive - Blasting Smite: Smite deals damage in an area, dealing half damage to all monsters and enemy minions near the target and stuns them for 1.5 seconds. Casting Smite on a monster restores 15% of missing Health and Mana. Passive - Jungler: Deal 45 additional magic damage to monsters over 2 seconds and gain 10 Health Regen and 5 Mana Regen per second while under attack from neutral monsters. Limited to 1 Jungle item

Jungle Items.description:
+30 Bonus Gold per Large Monster Kill
Passive - Chilling Smite: Smite can be cast on enemy champions, dealing reduced true damage and stealing 20% movement speed for 2 seconds.

Passive - Jungler: Deal 45 additional magic damage to monsters over 2 seconds and gain 10 Health Regen and 5 Mana Regen per second while under attack from neutral monsters.

Limited to 1 Jungle item
Jungle Items.name: Stalker's Blade
Jungle Items.sanitizedDescription: +30 Bonus Gold per Large Monster Kill Passive - Chilling Smite: Smite can be cast on enemy champions, dealing reduced true damage and stealing 20% movement speed for 2 seconds. Passive - Jungler: Deal 45 additional magic damage to monsters over 2 seconds and gain 10 Health Regen and 5 Mana Regen per second while under attack from neutral monsters. Limited to 1 Jungle item

Jungle Items.description:
+30 Bonus Gold per Large Monster Kill
Passive - Challenging Smite: Smite can be cast on enemy champions, marking them for 4 seconds. While marked, basic attacks deal true damage over 3 seconds, you have vision of them, and their damage to you is reduced by 20%.

Passive - Jungler: Deal 45 additional magic damage to monsters over 2 seconds and gain 10 Health Regen and 5 Mana Regen per second while under attack from neutral monsters.

Limited to 1 Jungle item
Jungle Items.name: Skirmisher's Sabre
Jungle Items.plaintext: Lets your Smite mark Champions, giving you combat power against them.
Jungle Items.sanitizedDescription: +30 Bonus Gold per Large Monster Kill Passive - Challenging Smite: Smite can be cast on enemy champions, marking them for 4 seconds. While marked, basic attacks deal true damage over 3 seconds, you have vision of them, and their damage to you is reduced by 20%. Passive - Jungler: Deal 45 additional magic damage to monsters over 2 seconds and gain 10 Health Regen and 5 Mana Regen per second while under attack from neutral monsters. Limited to 1 Jungle item

Starting Items.description:
Limited to 1 Trinket.

Active: Places a Stealth Ward that lasts 60 seconds (120 second cooldown).

At level 9, this ward's duration increases to 120 seconds.

Limit 3 Stealth Wards on the map per player.

(Trinkets cannot be used in the first 30 seconds of a game. Selling a Trinket will disable Trinket use for 120 seconds).
Starting Items.name: Warding Totem (Trinket)
Starting Items.sanitizedDescription: Limited to 1 Trinket. Active: Places a Stealth Ward that lasts 60 seconds (120 second cooldown). At level 9, this ward's duration increases to 120 seconds. Limit 3 Stealth Wards on the map per player. (Trinkets cannot be used in the first 30 seconds of a game. Selling a Trinket will disable Trinket use for 120 seconds).

Starting Items.description:
+60 Health
+15 Ability Power

Passive: +3 Mana Regen per 5 seconds.
Passive: Restores 4 Mana upon killing a unit.
Starting Items.name: Doran's Ring
Starting Items.sanitizedDescription: +60 Health +15 Ability Power Passive: +3 Mana Regen per 5 seconds. Passive: Restores 4 Mana upon killing a unit.

Starting Items.description:
Limited to 5 at one time.

Click to Consume: Restores 150 Health over 15 seconds.
Starting Items.name: Health Potion
Starting Items.plaintext: Consume to restore Health over time
Starting Items.sanitizedDescription: Limited to 5 at one time. Click to Consume: Restores 150 Health over 15 seconds.

Starting Items.description:
Can only carry 2 Vision Wards in inventory.

Click to Consume: Places a visible ward that reveals the surrounding area and invisible units in the area until killed. Limit 1 Vision Ward on the map per player.

(Revealing a ward in this manner grants a portion of the gold reward when that unit is killed.)
Starting Items.name: Vision Ward
Starting Items.plaintext: Use to temporarily provide vision and stealth detection in an area
Starting Items.sanitizedDescription: Can only carry 2 Vision Wards in inventory. Click to Consume: Places a visible ward that reveals the surrounding area and invisible units in the area until killed. Limit 1 Vision Ward on the map per player. (Revealing a ward in this manner grants a portion of the gold reward when that unit is killed.)
